message.welcome:
Welcome to InformMeBot!
Request a search for anything Lost or report something Found 
 For any additional information type /help
Enjoy!
message.help: InformMeBot is designed to help people find a thing they are searching for in a quick and efficient way. Please choose whether you wish to send a Lost report or Found report. Then proceed to choosing a category of classification of your sighting.
message.button_lost:
Hopefully I can assist the proccess of finding the thing that you ahve lost by connecting you to our newsletter.
But before that please choose the category of the thing at hand...
